title: #243: The Taste Of Tyranny | Chef Matt Pierce
description:
Devious multinational food conglomerates have partnered up to destroy the health of humanity all in the name of profits, and as bad as that sounds, it isn’t the worst thing they have planned. The depopulation agenda is never far behind when the large corporations join forces on a project, and the killing of the population through the food system certainly does qualify as another one of their “projects”.

A little bit of education can help us to move out of the direct path of the poisonous foods that are being served to humanity, and Chef Matt Pierce has been around the food industry long enough to know a global food scam when he sees one. Will the people realize that they are doing the depopulation work for the Globalists by continuing to indulge in Frankenfoods, or will the benefits of low costs and convenience doom humanity to a life of sickness and obesity?
